setStateChangeCallback(String methodName!, CustomObject callable!) - method in class IPersistentState

the widget will call this method to register itself for statechanges of the component the method should set a callback which should call the method 'methodName' on 'callable!' whenever the state changed Event should be BBjCustomEvent.
